name: Ecological Systems
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #33 by Peace (Programming) and JuicyBoot (Art and Sound)

This Game is about managing Ecosystems, (as if the title didn't specify) in this game there are 2 creatures(3 if u count under development ones too) they are :-

  1. Greenoids
  2. Redoids
  3. Yellowoids(under development, but u can still spawn them)

Disclaimer - Due to rl problems i was not able to polish this game perfectly hence the game may not be as good as others, but im happy that it was completed before time ended
